::Shadow Wing::

She flew behind the two Preds walking through the forest.  She stayed 
within visual range.  She wanted to make sure they weren't up to 
something.  She did notice that she was flying in the direction of 
the Pred base, she knew it could also be a ploy to throw off an 
maximal tailing them.  So she kept with them.
